channel.title: WSBKPod
channel.description: Coverage of the World Superbike motorcycle road racing series
channel.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast about the World Superbike series
channel.itunes:summary: The WSBKPod podcast will cover the World Superbike motorcycle roadracing series including race reports, rider news and other topics related to the sport.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 1
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Inaugural episode with a 2005 season review and a preview of the 2006 calendar.
item.itunes:summary: Inaugural episode with a 2005 season review and a preview of the 2006 calendar.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 2
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #2 with a preview of the 2006 teams and riders.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #2 with a preview of the 2006 teams and riders.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 3
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #3 with a review of the 2006 pre-season testing and a preview of the upcoming race at Qatar.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #3 with a review of the 2006 pre-season testing and a preview of the upcoming race at Qatar.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 4
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #4 with a review of last weekend's Qatar race and a preview of the upcoming race at Phillip Island.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #4 with a review of last weekend's Qatar race and a preview of the upcoming race at Phillip Island.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 5
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #5 with the March calendar, a review of last weekend's Phillip Island race and a preview of the upcoming official test sessions.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #5 with the March calender, a review of last weekend's Phillip Island race and a preview of the upcoming official test sessions.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 6
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #6 with a medical review of the injured World Superbike racers and a tech talk about pressurized forks.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #6 with a medical review of the injured World Superbike racers and a tech talk about pressurized forks.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 7
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #7 with WSBK official test reviews and Valencia race preview.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #7 with WSBK official test reviews and Valencia race preview.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 8
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #8 with the April calendar, a review of last weekend's race at Valencia and a tech talk about traction control.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #8 with the April calendar, a review of last weekend's race at Valencia and a tech talk about traction control.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 9
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #9 with the May calendar, a preview of this weekend's race at Monza and an opinion piece about 1200cc Ducatis.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #9 with the May calendar, a preview of this weekend's race at Monza and an opinion piece about 1200cc Ducatis.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 10
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #10 with the second half of the May calendar, a review of this past weekend's race at Monza and a contest for episode #10.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #10 with the second half of the May calendar, a review of this past weekend's race at Monza and a contest for episode #10.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 11
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #11 with the Doug Chandler poster contest winner, a Silverstone preview and a review of this past weekend's race at Silverstone.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #11 with the Doug Chandler poster contest winner, a Silverstone preview and a review of this past weekend's race at Silverstone..

item.title: WSBKPod episode 12
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #12 with the June calendar, my Miller Motorsports Park stories, a review of last week's tire test at Brno and my Misano preview .
item.itunes:summary: Episode #12 with the June calendar, my Miller Motorsports Park stories, a review of last week's tire test at Brno and my Misano preview.

item.title: WSBKPod episode 13
item.itunes:author: Alan Fleming
item.description: Episode #13 with my vacation announcement and an interview with AMA Superbike privateer Brad Hendry.
item.itunes:summary: Episode #13 with my vacation announcement and an interview with AMA Superbike privateer Brad Hendry.
